/wiki/Virginia_opossum: Settled areas, woodlands near food sources
/wiki/Mountain_beaver: Moist forests with deep soil for burrows
/wiki/American_beaver: Lakes, streams, rivers with forested areas
/wiki/Arizona_gray_squirrel: Mountain riparian forests with broadleaf trees
/wiki/Western_gray_squirrel: Forested areas with oak and pine trees
/wiki/Mexican_fox_squirrel: Pine-oak and mixed conifer mountain forests
/wiki/Fox_squirrel: Open forests with oak and hickory
/wiki/Southwestern_red_squirrel: High-altitude spruce-fir and mixed coniferous forests
/wiki/Mount_Graham_red_squirrel: Spruce-fir forests and mixed-conifer zones at high elevations
/wiki/Texas_antelope_squirrel: Desert scrublands and rocky areas near shrubs
